text: for many Americans Easter Sunday is an
important religious holiday but for
everyone it is simply a wonderful
occasion to celebrate spring with family
as a little girl I looked forward to
wearing a new Easter dress and bonnet
every year my grandmother always made
Easter dinner a very special occasion
even now I love Easter candy as a mother
I have the fun of preparing an Easter
basket for my children they've already
received some cards and toys on the day
before Easter I dyed eggs and it's this
custom that made me think of a proverb I
want to share with you we say don't put
all your eggs in one basket
it means don't chance everything on one
thing
don't risk all that you have at one time
here's an example the businessman was
hopeful when he invested all his money
in a new computer company unfortunately
he suffered a great loss when the
company failed he shouldn't have
invested everything in one place
experienced investors know don't put all
your eggs in one basket
